about.description:
MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving
systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse
matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or
general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a
direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian
factorization.
about.summary: MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver

name: mumps-seq
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: mumps-seq
    version: 5.2.1
source:
    fn: MUMPS_5.2.1.tar.gz
    patches:
        - examples-mpilibs.patch
        - flang-support.patch
        - shared-libseq.patch
        - shared-mumps.patch
        - shared-pord.patch
    sha256: d988fc34dfc8f5eee0533e361052a972aa69cc39ab193e7f987178d24981744a
    url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/MUMPS_5.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 9
    run_exports:
        - mumps-seq >=5.2.1,<5.2.2.0a0
    script: ${RECIPE_DIR}/build-seq.sh
    string: hffacba7_9
requirements:
    build:
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-aarch64 2.35 h7c5f67c_9
        - binutils_linux-aarch64 2.35 h0a73b0c_29
        - gcc_impl_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h7315dce_17
        - gcc_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 haec8541_29
        - gfortran_impl_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h4c0979e_17
        - gfortran_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 hbb2cbdc_29
        - kernel-headers_linux-aarch64 4.18.0 hca5cc2b_10
        - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.35 h71b2515_9
        - libgcc-devel_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h1a28f53_17
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - libgfortran4 7.5.0 h2b9752b_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h7a64470_17
        - make 4.3 h309ac5b_1
        - sysroot_linux-aarch64 2.17 h4744778_10
    host:
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - libblas 3.8.0 10_h6e990d7_netlib
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - libgfortran-ng 7.5.0 h2b9752b_17
        - libgfortran4 7.5.0 h2b9752b_17
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - liblapack 3.8.0 10_h6e990d7_netlib
        - metis 5.1.0 he1b5a44_1006
        - scotch 6.0.9 h0eec0ba_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1009
    run:
        - libblas >=3.8.0,<4.0a0
        - libgcc-ng >=7.5.0
        - libgfortran-ng
        - libgfortran4 >=7.5.0
        - liblapack >=3.8.0,<3.9.0a0
        - metis >=5.1.0,<5.2.0a0
        - metis >=5.1.0,<5.2.0a0
        - mumps-include >=5.2.1,<5.2.2.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.9,<6.1.0a0
        - scotch >=6.0.9,<6.1.0a0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps_seq-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libsmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps_seq-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libdmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps_seq-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libcmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps_seq-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libzmumps_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common_seq-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmumps_common_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord_seq-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libpord_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq_seq-5.2.1${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq_seq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -h "${PREFIX}/lib/libmpiseq${SHLIB_EXT}"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/mumps_seq/mpi.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/mumps_seq/mpif.h"
about:
    description: 'MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for
        solving

        systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse

        matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or

        general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a

        direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian

        factorization.

        '
    doc_url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/index.php?page=doc
    home: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/
    license: CECILL-C
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: 'MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - SylvainCorlay
        - basnijholt
        - dalcinl
        - davidbrochart
        - jbweston
        - minrk
